promptVersions.body:
A loyalty program can have multiple benefit types. Each benefit type can have more than one benefit. Benefits can be associated with tiers.


Before you create a Loyalty Benefit Type for your loyalty program, we need to create benefit categories in the Loyalty Benefit Type object. As the name suggests, Benefit Types are used to group the Benefits.


We have created 2 Benefit Types here- Shipping & Exclusive Discounts. We have also created 3 categories here for our learning - Member Exclusives, Orders, Experiences


Click on Related tab to view the associated benefits.

You should see 3 benefits - Free Shipping on All Orders, Free Shipping on orders greater than $40 and Free Shipping on orders greater than $75
promptVersions.title: What are Benefit Types?
